name: internnumber1
text: After what he did on his book tour, I shudder to think what joining Nice Pete's mailing list would entail.

name: starch
text: Nolan (from the internet) is probably the number 1 subscriber.

name: norsef
text: But he thinks it should have been a bigger finger and that Pete should have filmed the re constructive surgery and the long and painful recovery. He watches it whilst eating.

name: dejavroom
text: why so little love for this strip?

name: godfatherofsouls
text: shutup shutup

name: shutup_shutup
text: it's a wonderful thing for a person to say.

name: st-elmos_fire
text: it is because we know that as soon as Pat realises its Ray he starts ranting about what Ray left in his trash can the last time he was over or something like that.

name: hellofyellin
text: A comment left by hellofyellin was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nighttoad, riotdejaneiro, jeffreyquah, gbeaton)

name: aplomb
text: In a dripping pseudo-British accent.

name: xud
text: Nothing beats a salami sandwich, cooked up real good like

name: whuppins
text: I'd love a poster of panel 4, by itself.

name: centipede_damascus
text: I love that Ray needs to tell Pat to shut up twice after only saying hello.

name: hollis
text: I think after a while it just becomes automatic.

name: pwb
text:
last panrl makes it an easy 5

nice pete is so creepy, but that's what makes him awesome

name: pwb
text: dang panel not panrl

name: taiiga
text: this is a good one. i like this one.

name: _cheesekayke
text: Damn, siccing Nice Pete on your nephew? That is cold, Ray. I expected better of you.

name: epicurus
text: Little nephew uses the French "Poseur" instead of the more mainstream "Poser"!

name: killingthejay
text: A poser is a difficult question.  A poseur is an impostor.  Look them up.

name: epicurus
text: Thanks!

name: riazm
text: Come on Pete, you could have used speakerphone.

name: hateandwar
text: I've seen a guy cut off a finger on the internet, it's probably not the kind of mailing list you want to be on.

name: tellumo
text: Nice Pete has disappointed his Yakuza boss.

name: xiaomimi
text:

name: le_baron_noir
text:
Quote:
everytime i see a shadow I still have a problem with it...

I wish so much that I didn't know exactly what Lyle is talking about, here.

name: professorhazard
text: I guess Molly was given a new hymen when she was resurrected.

name: i_love_kate
text: That's pretty grim, seeing as she was about eight when she died.

name: banzairabbit
text: I have a feeling that the phrase "shutup shutup" is something most people utter immediately after saying hello to Pat when phoning him.

name: chachibenji
text:
When Little Nephew became gothic, he also became high english or something as well, all "poseur" and such.
All goths are brits I guess pass it on and stuff.

name: kelissamunz
text: Is Ray humming the tune to "Get Dancing" by Disco Tex and the Sex-O-Lettes in panel 4? God, I hope so.

name: o2b
text: In my mind, Nice Pete has perfect diction.

name: shutup_shutup
text: I accidentally named myself after this strip.  I didn't even remember it when I registered.  Subconscious, go!

name: ouroboros
text: what could possibly go wrong in a strip titled "Nice Pete To the Rescue"
